name: Pwr-Ads
author: Victor

sections.description: Pwr-ads help you to customize ads on your website. It helps users the show the ads from various scripts as direct custom ads and if the user has no ads then it also makes you display custom-generated ads to your website. It helps users to gain profit from the ads shown on their websites. Pwr-ads also track Conversion for WordPress and WooCommerce. Pwr-ads also count clicks and impressions of the particular ads.
sections.installation: Install the pwr-ads-plugin to your WordPress website and then activate it. After that auto ads will start showing on your website. and then click on pwr-ads plugin and enter your unique user id which will make you customize your ads on your website. 1, 2, 3: You’re done!
sections.faq:
What does Pwr-ads do?

Pwr-ads show the ads to your websites and helps you earning.

Is pwr-ads user friendly?

Yes, It is.
